wikipedia_page.main: Captain Maurice John Kingscote (30 July 1887 – 5 June 1959) was a British polo champion.

response: On 18 July 1939, he married Joyce Patricia Kingscote (1917–2006), daughter of Captain Maurice John Kingscote, and had by her three daughters and two sons. He died on 10 April 1990.

On 31 August 1872, he married the Honourable Evelyn Mary Gifford, the fourth daughter of Robert Gifford, 2nd Baron Gifford. His son, Major Edric Kingscote, succeeded him as Gentleman Usher, but the post of Gentleman of the Cellars was abolished. His other son was Maurice John Kingscote.
* Maurice John Kingscote (1887-1959), British polo champion
